abstract: Bank of America is angling to be released from a confidential memorandum of understanding that was imposed by American regulators during the financial crisis, The Wall Street Journal reported.
snippet: Bank of America is angling to be released from a confidential memorandum of understanding that was imposed by American regulators during the financial crisis, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America is angling to be released from a confidential memorandum of understanding that was imposed by American  regulators during the financial crisis, The Wall Street Journal reported.

headline.main: BofA Wants Out of Secret U.S. Sanction
